reused_details.reused: Spain's shock loss to Morocco and elimination from the men's World Cup has triggered changes for the country's national football team, with coach Luis Enrique replaced by Luis de la Fuente.
reused_by_aic: Enrique's side lost to Morocco on penalties in a huge upset in the last 16 after failing to break down their opponents over 120 minutes.

reused_details.reused: Enrique, a Barcelona legend, took over the national team in 2018 to start revamping the squad after its elimination in the round of 16 of the World Cup in Russia.
reused_by_aic: Enrique took over the national side in 2018, and then again in 2019 after taking a four-month break for 'personal issues'.
